description: This package contains an object-oriented .net wrapper for the RightScale API v. 1.5.
releaseNotes:
v0.2.7: adding ServerArray.setEnabled, setDisabled, setState methods

v0.2.6: updating some error logic for parameter formatting on object update calls

v0.2.5: fixing ServerArray.create() input order... 

v0.2.4: updating ServerArray tests and object layer with some specific unit tests.  Also updating a ton of minor little fixes related to Tag scope and other object layer naming conventions.  

v0.2.0: New objects supported and tested: Resource Tagging, Volume, VolumeType, VolumeAttachment, Cloud, Session (with instance session login), ServerTemplate, MultiCloudImage, Inputs and Image

See milstone issues closed: https://github.com/patrickmcclory/RightScaleNetAPI/issues?milestone=2&state=closed

v0.1.3: major fixes to authentication and authentication failure workflows.  

v0.1.2: major fixes to input processing

v0.1.1: incremental fixes and major bug in object relationships fixed

v0.1.0: Alpha release of RightScale.netClient - this is not a fully fleshed out version, but the Server, Instance and Deployment objects are testing well and seem to be fully functional along with the underlying authentication mechanisms.  This release is partially documented by the 0.1.0 milestone in Github (https://github.com/patrickmcclory/RightScaleNetAPI/issues?milestone=1&state=closed) though we started tracking tasks after the bulk of the core and object model were stubbed out.
summary: Object model and client for RightScale API 1.5.  For more information on the API check out the RightScale Support site: http://support.rightscale.com/12-Guides/RightScale_API_1.5
title: RightScale .net API Client
